statements: UPDATE mapping_information SET road_type = 'Highway', traffic_signs = '{"stop_sign": true}' WHERE map_id = 1;
UPDATE mapping_information SET lane_information = '{"left_lane": true}', longitude = -123.456789 WHERE map_id = 2;
UPDATE mapping_information SET latitude = 45.678912, longitude = -122.654321 WHERE map_id = 1;
UPDATE mapping_information SET traffic_signs = '{"stop_sign": true, "speed_limit": 30}' WHERE map_id = 2;
UPDATE mapping_information SET car_id = 101, location_id = 201, map_data = '{"key": "value"}', timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE mapping_id = 1
UPDATE navigation_data SET destination_id = 301, car_id = 102, route = '["A", "B", "C"]', timestamp = '2022-01-05 10:30:00' WHERE navigation_id = 2
UPDATE mapping_information SET map_data = '{"map": "updated"}', timestamp = NOW() WHERE mapping_id = 1;
UPDATE navigation_data SET destination_id = 2, route = '{"path": "updated"}', timestamp = NOW() WHERE navigation_id = 3;
UPDATE mapping_information SET location_id = 5, map_data = '{"key": "value"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE localization_data SET destination_location = '{"latitude": 37.7749, "longitude": -122.4194}', car_id = 3 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE mapping_information SET map_data = '{"building":"A","floor":2}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE localization_data SET current_location = '{"latitude":37.7749,"longitude":-122.4194}', destination_location = '{"latitude":37.7749,"longitude":-122.4194}' WHERE car_id = 100 AND id = 1;
UPDATE MappingData SET street_name = 'Main Street' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE VehicleDetails SET year = 2020, model = 'Sedan' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE MappingData SET street_name = 'Main Street' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE VehicleDetails SET year = 2022, model = 'SUV' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
UPDATE MappingPoints SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE point_id = 1;
UPDATE Roads SET road_type = 'Highway', road_name = 'Updated Highway' WHERE road_id = 3;
UPDATE MappingPoints SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE point_id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicles SET color = 'Red', manufacturer = 'Toyota' WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
